廇字的基本解释

廇
liù
堂的中央；正房的中央。
房子的大梁。（二）古同“霤”，屋檐上接雨水的水槽。

廇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liù］
［《廣韻》力救切，去宥，來。］
中庭，堂中央。

廇字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【广字部】　廇； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页349第06
【唐韻】【集韻】【正韻】?力救切，音溜。【說文】中庭也。【玉篇】屋廇也。【劉向·九歎】刜讒賊於中廇兮。【註】中廇，室中央也。【玉篇】一作霤。　又【爾雅·釋宮】杗廇謂之梁。【註】屋大梁也。【疏】大梁，一名杗廇。

廇字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
廇字的起名意思

暂无。

Li
Basic explanation of words
Li
liù
The center of the hall; the center of the main room.
The girders of the house. (2) Gu Tong "slid", the rainwater trough on the eaves.
Li
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liù］
["Guangyun" tries to save Qi, go to You, come. ]
Atrium, in the middle of the hall.
Li
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [Guang Zi Department] 　廇; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 349 06
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Try to save the cut, the sound slips. [Said the text] Atrium also. [Jade articles] Houses also. [Liu Xiang·Nine Sighs] The slanderer is in the middle. [Note] Zhongri, also in the center of the room. [Jade articles] A slip.　[Erya·Shigong] It is called Liang. [Note] The roof beams are also. 【Sparse】Big Liang, a sigh.
